<head>
 <title></title>
 <link href="http://localhost:1234/themes/system/css/jquery-ui-1.8.16.custom.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />
 <link href="http://localhost:1234/themes/system/css/system.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />
 <link href="http://localhost:1234/themes/system/css/demo_page.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />
 <link href="http://localhost:1234/themes/system/css/demo_table.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />
 <link href="http://localhost:1234/themes/system/css/grid.custom.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />
 <link href="http://localhost:1234/themes/system/css/demo_table_jui.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />
 <link href="http://localhost:1234/themes/system/css/ui.dynatree.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />
 <style type="text/css" >
 .treeRegion { font-size:10px; font-family:Verdana; width:300px; 
 float:none; height:250px; overflow:auto; 
 border:1px solid white; margin:10px 0 0;
 }
 .container { position:relative; width:260px; height:150px; margin-top:15px; }
 #container {
 margin: 30px auto;
 padding: 0;
 }
 </style>
 <script src="http://localhost:1234/themes/system/js/jquery.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
 <script src="http://localhost:1234/themes/system/js/jquery.ui.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
 <script src="http://localhost:1234/scripts/date.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
 <script src="http://localhost:1234/scripts/ui.dataTables.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script> 
 <script src="http://localhost:1234/scripts/system.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
</head>
<body>
<form action="/services/@Service/instances/@Instance/bookmarks/@Bookmark" method="post" onsubmit="return checkRequired()">
 <table>
 <tr>
 <td> </td>
 <td> </td>
 <td></td>
 <td><button type="button" name="Advanced" onClick="toggleAdvanced();" > Advanced</button> </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><span style="font-weight:bold;">Name</span></td>
 <td><input type="text" id="Name" name="Name" value="[[Name]]" /></td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><span style="font-weight:bold;">Value</span></td>
 <td><textarea rows="15" cols="45" id="Value" name="Value">[[xpath('//Value/node()')]]</textarea>
 </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td><span class="advancedRegion" style="font-weight:bold;">CSS Class</span></td>
 <td><input type="text" id="cssClass" name="cssClass" value="[[cssClass]]" class="advancedRegion" />
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td> </td>
 <td> </td>
 <td><button type="button" name="Cancel" onClick="exitWizard()" > Cancel </button> </td>
 <td><button type="submit" name="Submit" > Done </button> </td>
 </tr>
 </table>
</form>
</body>
</html>" IndexNumber="1" /> <uaba:ActivityDTO FieldName="" FieldValue="" IndexNumber="2" /> </uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity.FieldsCollection> </uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity> </FlowStep> </Flowchart.StartNode> <FlowStep> <sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"> <av:Point x:Key="ShapeLocation">170,3</av:Point> <av:Size x:Key="ShapeSize">200,22</av:Size> </scg:Dictionary> </sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <uaba:DsfCommentActivity DisplayName="DEF" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="200,22" Text="01-02-2012 : Travis.Frisinger@dev2.co.za
